title: kurai tIrum varaiyil
sahitya:
kurai tIrum varaiyil muraiyiTTu varuvEn murugA nI uLLam karaiyum varai en


anupallavi

  aruLE vaDivAgum surudip-poruLE karuNAkaranE un kAdellAm tuLaikka


caraNam    koDum iDar OyAdu toDara en manam paDum pADu viraivil aDiyODu maraindiDa 
paDi mIdu enakkun parivuDaiya pEraruL kiDaikkum varaiyil aDiyunadaip-piDittu
